body:
When building across in a Gladiator game i mined the wrong block a Person ran across and fell though then i got the Point... -NOTICE: THIS WAS NOT ON PURPOSE! 

 
And yer i was on lime btw-
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 


Thanks this was probley lag but i got the point for Accerdently spliefing a team mate....

Please not infraction if possible beings this was not ment to be...

title: Erm there might be a bug...

replies.body: Accidents happen. As long as you apologized, don't worry!
replies.body_tagged: Accidents happen. As long as you apologized, don't worry!

replies.body: Erm this is a bug and you have to report it at github....

replies.body: Yeah, on DTM maps I get xp if I accidentally spleef my own team too xD
replies.body_tagged: Yeah, on DTM maps I get xp if I accidentally spleef my own team too xD

replies.body: Yeah, it is still technically counted as a kill, so you get the xp.
